links.*: The Pant-Hoot J.R.R. Tolkien Memorial Calendar 1975

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==February==
* '''[[16 February|16]]''' - On the advice of [[Christopher Tolkien]], [[The Tolkien Society]] appoints [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] as Honorary President in perpetuo. 
* '''[[20 February|20]]''' - Artist and linguist [[Ryszard Derdziński]] is born.

==March==
* '''[[21 March|21]]''' - Actor [[Joseph Mawle]] is born.

==May==
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien's World (1974)|Tolkien's World]]'', by [[Randel Helms]], is published.

==August==
* '''[[16 August|16]]''' - Tolkien scholar [[Corey Olsen]] is born.
* '''[[23 August|23]]-[[26 August|26]]''' - [[Mythcon 5]].

==September==
* '''[[13 September|13]]-[[15 September|15]]''' - The first [[Oxonmoot 1974|Oxonmoot]] is held in [[Oxford]].

==October==
* '''[[31 October|31]]''' - Artist [[Randy Gallegos]] is born.

==November==
* '''[[26 November|26]]''' - ''[[Bilbo's Last Song]]'' is published as a poster.

==?==

* '''?''' - [[The Pant-Hoot J.R.R. Tolkien Memorial Calendar 1975]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1975]] is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[C.S. Lewis: A Biography (1974 book)|C.S. Lewis: A Biography]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth|The Languages of Middle Earth]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien Language Notes 2]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mithrandir (book)|''Mithrandir'']], by Stephen O. Miller, is published.
* '''?''' - [[Lars-Terje Lysemose]], founder of [[Imladris, Danmarks Tolkienforening]] and editor of its journal ''[[Athelas (journal)|Athelas]]'', is born.
{{Years|1971|1972|1973|1974|1975|1976|1977|}}
